successes.title: Neurio: Home Intelligence
successes.description: A revolutionary new technology that makes an ordinary home smart. Learn what's happening in your home, and teach it some new tricks!

Pledges.description: FRIENDS - Thanks, every little bit helps! A personally typed thank you email from our founders, and a shout-out on our site for your support.
FRIENDS WITH BENEFITS - Thanks for supporting our campaign! In return, we’ll send you a super cool 3D printed Neurio keychain, a thank you note, and a shout-out on our site for your support.
LAUNCH DAY SALE! - Get a Neurio Home Package: a Sensor, access to Cloud, and the Trigger and mobile apps. You also get access to the open API's and source code.

SUPER EARLY BIRD - Did you miss the launch day bonanza?  Here's another limited time offer: get the same Neurio Home Package: a Sensor, access to Cloud, and the Trigger and mobile apps. You also get access to the open API's and source code.

So you missed the launch day event, but it’s still a great deal! Get a Neurio Home Package: a Sensor, access to Cloud, and the Trigger and mobile apps. You also get access to the open API's and source code.
3-PHASE NEURIO PACKAGE: a Sensor, Current Transformers for 3-phase, access to Cloud, and the Trigger and mobile apps. You also get access to the open API's and source code.

SOLAR EARLY ADOPTERS - Get a Neurio Solar Package: a Sensor with solar expansion kit, and everything else in the Neurio Home Package. You also get the app with solar reporting features. *** For 3-phase homes, you’ll need TWO Solar Packages ***
PRE-ORDER DEAL - Get a Neurio Home Package: a Sensor, access to Cloud, and the Trigger and the Neurio apps. You also get access to the open API's and source code.
DELUXE SENSOR PACKAGE - Get TWO Neurio Sensors plus everything else in the Home Package. If you have a 3-phase home, or your home has two meter feeds, this is your Neurio package!

VIP PACKAGE - You will be invited to visit our Vancouver office, meet our team and have dinner and merriment with our founders. Need integration or developer support? You got it! You'll also receive a Neurio Home Package: a Sensor, access to Cloud, and the Trigger and mobile apps. You also get access to the open API's and source code.
